machine_extruder_start_code.default_value:
;---- Starting Start G-code Extruder 1 ----
;T0                             ;switch to extruder 1
;G92 E0                      ;reset extruder distance
;G1 F2000 E93           ;load filament
;G92 E0                      ;reset extruder distance
;M104 S{material_print_temperature}
;---- Ending Start G-code Extruder 1 ----

machine_extruder_end_code.default_value:
;---- Starting End G-code Extruder 1 ----
;G92 E0                       ;reset extruder distance
;G1 F800 E-5               ;short retract
;G1 F2400 X5 Y5         ;move near prime tower
;G1 F2000 E-93           ;long retract for filament removal
;G92 E0                       ;reset extruder distance
;G90                            ;absolute coordinate
;---- Ending End G-code Extruder 1 ----
